descriptionHtml:
I am not good at English, it becomes machine translation.
Add follower ney. 
You will be able to meet up with the Huntsman of the White Run. Nei uses its own Shout Crimson Veil. 
It gives slip damage to near-enemy opponent NPC. Please take me there. 
Thank you, many authors of the wonderful mod used to create it.

Thanks to Mr. Sakata who shared with Mr. Crential who offered weapons for our own shout implementation and test play.

CREDITS
